unit.name: Orca
unit.notes: May transport zwölf Fire Warriors, Pathfinders, XV15 Stealth Battlesuits, XV25 Stealth Battlesuits, Gun Drones, Broadsides, Kroot Warriors, Kroot Master Shaper und Kroot Hounds. XV8 Crisis, XV9-04 Hazard, XV88 Broadside und XV95 Ghostkeel Battlesuits counts as zwei Einheiten. May also carry bis zu zwei Gun Drones in addition to any other cargo.
unit.crit: The Orca und all units being transported are destroyed.

unit.name: Custodian Class Battleship
unit.notes: May transport 18 Einheiten, in beliebiger Kombination und the units being transported on them: Orca, Manta. Mantas Zählt als thee Einheiten. Spec[*]: A Gravitic Tracer Salvo may be fired at a marked formation of any type.

unit.name: Protector Class Cruiser
unit.notes: May transport sechs Einheiten, in beliebiger Kombination und the units being transported on them: Orca, Manta. Mantas Zählt als thee Einheiten.

unit.name: Protector II Class Cruiser
unit.notes: Must select either Gravitic Tracer Salvo OR zwei Pin-Point attacks at the start of the battle. May transport sechs Einheiten, in beliebiger Kombination und the units being transported on them: Orca, Manta. Mantas Zählt als thee Einheiten. Spec[*]: A Gravitic Tracer Salvo may be fired at a marked formation of any type.
